title: Fragment, 1902-1-491, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, cotton(?)
Technique: two integrated fabric structures; 4&1satin and plain weave.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 69 x 29 cm (27 3/16 x 11 7/16 in.)
description: Cartouches formed by strapwork containing a snake on a leaf shape. Center of strapwork a medallion contsaining half the crowned letter 'M'; another compartment containing half a vase of flowers. Selage at right. . Ivory, red and yellow.
